org.fcrepo.webhooks

Class FedoraWebhooks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource
      • org.fcrepo.webhooks.FedoraWebhooks

  • @Scope(value="prototype")
@Component
public class FedoraWebhooks
extends AbstractResource
    Webhooks callbacks
